verbs.description: art and money in renaissance florence [ARGM-TMP: in a time when the actions of bankers and hedge fund managers fuel instability not only in financial markets but also in the market for advanced art] [ARG0: many in the art world] [V: complain] [ARGM-MNR: bitterly] [ARG1: of the ludovica sebregondi art lorenzo bini smaghi renaissance florence fra angelico palazzo medici riccardi palazzo strozzi gian galeazzo sforza fondazione palazzo strozzi florence]
